channel.title: Wtf? I need help with this, i cant turn on my server anymore!
channel.description:
Whenever i click on runserver.bat i get this error...
[code] Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use? [/code] It does that when i dont have another server running! And i think this is starting to be bull shit tbh. Can someone please Help???

item.title: Wtf? I need help with this, i cant turn on my server anymore!
item.dc:creator: @Pwnage_Sh0w Pwnage Sh0w
item.description:
@Pwnage_Sh0w wrote:

No… Rebooting might work. Its probably like this from my server being on earlier :S. If it doesnt work idk what do to… And no im not trying to run using utorrent. uTorrent is just fucking retarded as hell, im running it like a normal server. Hit Runserver and play it. And i portforwarded with my Router.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2008, 08:36:14 pm[/size][hr]Yey it worked! Rebooting worked w00t!! Thanks Screech Rep +

Read full topic

item.source: Wtf? I need help with this, i cant turn on my server anymore!

item.title: Wtf? I need help with this, i cant turn on my server anymore!
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“Pwnage Sh0w, post:1, topic:236238”]Whenever i click on runserver.bat i get this error…

Error: Unable to startup listener on 43594 - port already in use?

It does that when i dont have another server running! And i think this is starting to be bull shit tbh. Can someone please Help???[/quote]

Are you trying to run your server using Utorrent?

If so. You will get that error if you have Utorrent running. So, basically you were supposed to set the things to your specific port and then restart your computer. DO NOT start up Utorrent because then it uses up your port. Then run your server. You’ll be fine.

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf? I need help with this, i cant turn on my server anymore!

item.title: Wtf? I need help with this, i cant turn on my server anymore!
item.dc:creator: @jb_blaze jb blaze
item.description:
@jb_blaze wrote:

first u need to make sure 43594 is clear.

go to control panel-network connections- right click on the internet u use- advanced options-, under firewall hit properties- then advanced button under TCp/UCP or w/e- then add your port if you already did make sure the other programs arent taking it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf? I need help with this, i cant turn on my server anymore!
item.dc:creator: @Pwnage_Sh0w Pwnage Sh0w
item.description:
@Pwnage_Sh0w wrote:

I did both of my source’s im using… TonyPker13’s RubiksScape and The Reaper X’s Reapage Scape V1. They both have the error. And i dont have another runserver up and noone else i know use’s it on my computer… I got 2 accounts on my computer, mine and my mother’s. So my mom doesnt have access to this and she doesnt go on the computer anyways :P. So i dont know what. Do u mean someone is using it on a different computer and same port? cause a friend of mine that owns a server used this source, and it was the same port as me and i still ran my server.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2008, 05:19:11 pm[/size][hr]My friend just told me on MSN that he saw someone using my server with my IP and my username. And that i got hacked. But now he just said He’s on MoparScape’s hybrid scape so nvm…

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf? I need help with this, i cant turn on my server anymore!

item.title: Wtf? I need help with this, i cant turn on my server anymore!
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Change the port by going into server.java and search;

public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594;

Then change the 43594 to another port, E.G 5555. Make sure that port is accepted though, then compile and run. Should work then. Or an alternative is to find and then stop the process that’s running on port 43954.

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf? I need help with this, i cant turn on my server anymore!

item.title: Wtf? I need help with this, i cant turn on my server anymore!
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

I saw Someone have a problem like this

There’s a few problems to this

  1. You already have a run server up

  2. Someone else is using the source you used with the port of 43594
    __________________________________________________________________________-

Just change the port you are using… or use a different source

Read full topic
